alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Dawson; Forsyth; North Fulton; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cherokee, Forsyth, southern Dawson, northeastern Fulton, southeastern Pickens and eastern Bartow Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Dawsonville to near Cassville, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Canton, Cartersville, Cumming, Dawsonville, Mountain Park, Roswell, Alpharetta, Milton, Woodstock, Sugar Hill, Holly Springs, Emerson, Ball Ground, Nelson, White, Waleska, Free Home, Cassville, Buffington, and Dougherty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bartow; Cherokee; Dawson; Forsyth; North Fulton; Pickens
